headline.main: RESEARCHERS LINK OBESITY AND CHEMICAL ABNORMALITY

docs.lead_paragraph: A new biochemical abnormality has been found in humans that may explain why some obese people have difficulty in controlling their weight, according to a report published in today's issue of The New England Journal of Medicine. The abnormality was detected among a group of 23 obese patients at two Boston hospitals who volunteered for a study done by three Harvard University researchers.
